heading: Today
text: Valley fog burning off to sunshine, mixed with a few high clouds. Not as cool.  Highs in the upper 60s to low 70s, a few mid 70s in the warmer valleys.  Winds becoming south up to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph through the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear, with some clouds near and north of the Quebec border late.  Areas of river valley fog.  Lows in the 40s, a few upper 30s in the cold spots north.  South winds near 10 mph in the evening, diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Saturday
text: Patchy valley fog, and any early clouds far north giving way to sunshine.  Much warmer.  Highs in the 70s to around 80.  Winds light and variable.
